article_title: Arkansas Moves Away From Obamacare Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: To ensure the promised repeal of Obamacare expansion occurs on schedule, Arkansas policymakers still have some work to do. Here are 3 such steps.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
